properties.entry: SELECT USER_ID , USER_EMAIL , USER_PWD , ENROLL_DATE , OUTROLL_DATE , STATUS , MEMBERSHIP , EXCELLENT_FREELANCE , BLACKLIST , IDENTIFY_EMAIL , ADMIN , USER_TYPE , JOB_TITLE , COMPANY , SKILL , PAY_RATE , PROFILE_IMAGE , LOCATION , SELF_INTRODUCTION FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS='Y' AND USER_ID=? OR USER_EMAIL=? AND USER_PWD=?
SELECT C.CAREER_NO , C.USER_ID , C.COMPANY_INFO , C.CAREER_TITLE , C.RETIRE_DATE , C.HIRE_DATE , CAREER_INFO , CAREER_STATUS FROM CAREER C JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.USER_ID=M.USER_ID) WHERE C.USER_ID = ?
SELECT E.EDUCATION_NO , E.UNIVERSITY , E.MAJOR , E.DEGREE , E.ENROLL_DATE , E.GRAUATED_DATE , E.USER_ID FROM EDUCATION E JOIN MEMBER M ON (E.USER_ID =M.USER_ID) WHERE E.USER_ID = ?

SELECT CERT.CERTIFICATE_NO , CERT.CERTIFICATE_NAME , CERT.CERTIFICATE_AUTH , CERT.CERTIFICATE_DATE , CERT.USER_ID FROM CERTIFICATION CERT JOIN MEMBER M ON (CERT.USER_ID =M.USER_ID) WHERE CERT.USER_ID = ?

SELECT PORT.PORTFOLIO_NO , PORT.PORTFOLIO_TITLE , PORT.PORTFOLIO_CONTENTS , PORT.PORTFOLIO_LINK , PORT.PORTFOLIO_SKILL , PORT.PORTFOLIO_START , PORT.PORTFOLIO_END , PORT.USER_ID , PORT.PORTFOLIO_FILE FROM PORTFOLIO PORT JOIN MEMBER M ON (PORT.USER_ID =M.USER_ID) WHERE PORT.USER_ID = ?
SELECT PUB.BOOK_NO , PUB.BOOK_NAME , PUB.BOOK_INFO , PUB.PUBLISHER , PUB.BOOK_DATE , PUB.USER_ID FROM PUBLICATION PUB JOIN MEMBER M ON (PUB.USER_ID =M.USER_ID) WHERE PUB.USER_ID = ?
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( USER_ID , USER_EMAIL , USER_PWD , USER_TYPE ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? )

INSERT INTO PORTFOLIO ( PORTFOLIO_NO , USER_ID , PORTFOLIO_TITLE , PORTFOLIO_CONTENTS , PORTFOLIO_LINK , PORTFOLIO_SKILL , PORTFOLIO_START , PORTFOLIO_END , PORTFOLIO_FILE ) VALUES ( SEQ_PORTFOLIO_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL )

INSERT INTO CAREER ( CAREER_NO , USER_ID , COMPANY_INFO , CAREER_TITLE , CAREER_INFO , HIRE_DATE , RETIRE_DATE , CAREER_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_CAREER_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , DEFAULT )
INSERT INTO CERTIFICATION ( CERTIFICATE_NO , USER_ID , CERTIFICATE_NAME , CERTIFICATE_AUTH , CERTIFICATE_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_CERTIFICATION_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , NULL , NULL , NULL )
INSERT INTO EDUCATION ( EDUCATION_NO , USER_ID , UNIVERSITY , MAJOR , DEGREE , ENROLL_DATE , GRAUATED_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_EDUCATION_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL )
INSERT INTO PUBLICATION ( BOOk_NO , USER_ID , BOOK_NAME , BOOK_INFO , PUBLISHER , BOOK_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_PUBLICATION_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID=?
UPDATE MEMBER SET LOCATION = ? , COMPANY = ? , SELF_INTRODUCTION = ? , PAY_RATE = ? WHERE USER_ID= ?
UPDATE PORTFOLIO SET PORTFOLIO_TITLE = ? , PORTFOLIO_LINK = ? , PORTFOLIO_CONTENTS = ? , PORTFOLIO_START = ? , PORTFOLIO_END = ? , PORTFOLIO_SKILL = ? WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE CAREER SET COMPANY_INFO = ? , CAREER_TITLE = ? , CAREER_INFO = ? , HIRE_DATE = ? , RETIRE_DATE =? WHERE USER_ID =?
UPDATE EDUCATION SET UNIVERSITY = ? , MAJOR = ? , DEGREE = ? , ENROLL_DATE = ? , GRAUATED_DATE = ? WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE CERTIFICATION SET CERTIFICATE_NAME = ? , CERTIFICATE_AUTH = ? , CERTIFICATE_DATE = ? WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE PUBLICATION SET BOOK_NAME = ? , BOOK_INFO = ? , PUBLISHER = ? , BOOK_DATE = ? WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE ADMIN='N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT USER_ID , USER_EMAIL , USER_PWD , ENROLL_DATE , OUTROLL_DATE , STATUS , MEMBERSHIP , EXCELLENT_FREELANCE , BLACKLIST , IDENTIFY_EMAIL , ADMIN , USER_TYPE , JOB_TITLE , COMPANY , SKILL , PAY_RATE , PROFILE_IMAGE , LOCATION , SELF_INTRODUCTION FROM MEMBER
) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT USER_ID , USER_EMAIL , USER_PWD , ENROLL_DATE , OUTROLL_DATE , STATUS , MEMBERSHIP , EXCELLENT_FREELANCE , BLACKLIST , IDENTIFY_EMAIL , ADMIN , USER_TYPE , JOB_TITLE , COMPANY , SKILL , PAY_RATE , PROFILE_IMAGE , LOCATION , SELF_INTRODUCTION FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y' AND ADMIN = 'N'
